name: Viral Outbreak (dotPixel)
description:
Made for Roguelike Monthly Jam #2.

If you experience lag, download the desktop version for better performance.

Please play in fullscreen for the best experience (So you don't accidentally click outside the game window and unfocus)

Viral Outbreak is a Horde Survival (Survivors-like) roguelite game where you must face off against legions of the undead in a fight for survival.  Kill zombies and earn cash to upgrade your arsenal.  Destroy graves and gather scraps to build defences.

Controls:

Move - WASD / Arrow Keys

Shoot - Left Click

Build Defences - Space

Pause - P / ESC

Toggle Fullscreen - F4
